          Creates an array of Ninja()s for the amount GameEngine.NUM_NINJAS

          Creates an array of Rooms() for the amount GameEngine.NUM_ROOMS

          Creates a Briefcase()

          Creates a Bullet() powerup for the Player()'s Gun()

          Radar radar
          Creates a Radar() powerup

        • invincible

          Invincibility invincible
          Create an Invincibility() powerup

        • gb

          GameBoard gb
          Creates a GameBoard()

        • gun

          Gun gun
          Creates a Gun() for the Player()

        • looking

          boolean looking
          Boolean to represent whether the player is looking in a direction or not. Activates with GameEngine.playerLook(String)

        • gameOver

          boolean gameOver
          Boolean to represent whether the player is out of lives or not

        • briefcaseFound

          boolean briefcaseFound
          Boolean to represent whether the player has found the Briefcase(). When they do, they win

        • win

          boolean win
          Boolean to represent whether the player has won. If true, the game ends.

    • Class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.prog_final.Player extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • MAX_LIVES

          int MAX_LIVES
          The amount of Player.lives the player begins with

        • INVINCIBLE_TURNS

          int INVINCIBLE_TURNS
          The amount of turns that the player is invincible for

        • lives

          int lives
          The current amount of lives the player has. Initially set to Player.MAX_LIVES

        • gun

          Gun gun
          Creates a Gun() object for the player

        • row

          int row
          The row that the player is on Determines position on GameBoard()

        • column

          int column
          The column that the player is on Determines position on GameBoard()

        • invincible

          boolean invincible
          Determines whether the player is invincible or not. The player is invincible after they pick up the Invincibility() powerup for Player.INVINCIBLE_TURNS amount of turns

        • turnCounter

          int turnCounter
          Turn counter that increments the amount of turns the Player() is invincible for. When it reaches Player.INVINCIBLE_TURNS, the player isn't invincible anymore.

        • playerMark

          java.lang.String playerMark
          The player mark that represents the player on the GameBoard()

    • Class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.prog_final.PowerUps extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • row

          int row
          This defines the row of the object, which is half of what defines the powerup's position on the grid.

        • column

          int column
          This defines the column of the object, which is the other half of what defines the powerup's position on the grid.

        • available

          boolean available
          This shows whether or not the powerup is has been used
